template.description: assert a variable of a method must not be null
template.name: assert != null

templates.template: assert null != ${var} : "'${var}' of method '${enclosing_method}' must not be null";
assert null != ${localVar} : "Parameter '${localVar}' of method '${enclosing_method}' must not be null";

template.description: assert a method parameter must not be empty
template.name: assert !isEmpty - Parameter

templates.template: assert null != ${localVar} && !${localVar}.isEmpty() : "Parameter '${localVar}' of method '${enclosing_method}' must not be empty";
